comments:
1. Stepping through some code

2. oddly, 'this' in the variables pane wasn't showing all the fields I was 
expecting it to (its a Core object so I don't know representation).  Class in 
question is org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.

3. in the source text of method validateEdit(), I selected the 
field "validator" from the expression "	if (validator == null) " and 
selected "Display" from the menu.  Note this was the field I expected to see 
under "this" in the inspector but didn't.
